name: Star Trek: The Hand of Fate
name_original: Star Trek: The Hand of Fate
description:
**WEBGL Version Now Available!**

Use your typing skills to save the Alpha Quadrant in this short, but EPIC journey!

Made for Star Trek Jam, June 2016.

Programming/Music by Pat Flannery

Graphic Design/Modelling by Micky Hulse

Pixelfoot Games 2016.
